channel.title: error on ThingsDB documentation
channel.description: Recent content in error on ThingsDB documentation

item.title: code
item.description: Returns the error code of an error type. This function does not generate an event. Function error.code() Arguments None Return value Returns error code of an error. Example This code uses code() to return the error code for an error: type_err("incorrect type").code(); Return value in JSON format -61

item.title: len
item.description: Returns the length of an error message. This function does not generate an event. Function error.len() Arguments None Return value Returns length of an error message. Example This code uses len() to return the length of the error message: type_err("incorrect type given").len(); Return value in JSON format 20

item.title: msg
item.description: Returns the error message of an error type. This function does not generate an event. Function error.msg() Arguments None Return value Returns error message of an error. Example This code uses code() to return the error code for an error: type_err("incorrect type").msg(); Return value in JSON format "incorrect type"
